entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Significant Performance Disparity Between Arm64 and x64 Write Barriers #106051
  • [API Proposal]: Utf8JsonReader should read from JsonNode #106047
  • [Analyzer Proposal]: Anlyzer for wrong usage of interpolated string with Logger methods #106041
    Future
  • [wasm] Can no longer build on main using stable debian #106036
  • assert(firstILBlock->hasProfileWeight()); #106033
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] How to compile linux-musl-arm64 shared libraries on Ubuntu( x64) #106029
  • [browser] Unsupported long branch opcode #106028
    9.0.0
  • Android API 23, Runtime Crash in .NET 9 #106025
    9.0.0
  • Trust self-signed certificates when using PrincipalContext and DirectoryEntry #106024
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: TypeName.MakeSimpleTypeName(AssemblyNameInfo) to avoid type name reparsing #106022
    9.0.0
  • failure in TestStackOverflow.Program.TestStackOverflow3 #106021
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(imm < maxVal) || ((imm & signBitsMask) == signBitsMask)' during 'Generate code' #106020
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.Collections on 8/2/2024 1:16:56 PM #106027
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Assertion at mono/utils/lock-free-alloc.c:210, condition `!desc->in_use' not met #106007
  • Error loading rules.ninja when building coreclr tests locally #106005
  • Test failure:System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.MultipleReadsAndWrites #106002

Closed

  • ColorTranslator.ToWin32 is inefficient #105992
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.PortableExecutable.Tests.PEBuilderTests.NativeResources #102979
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: LdapSessionOptions.CaCertificates Property #104260
  • Containerize the test execution #2600
    Future
  • Libraries work to support Cloud Native effort for .NET 9 #97522
    9.0.0
  • compilation gives error SYSLIB1094 for a GeneratedComInterface interface deriving from an interface in another project #102602
    9.0.0
  • DI behavior change between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 #102888
    9.0.0
  • Port Microsoft.Extensions documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88562
    9.0.0
  • In .NET 9 preview 5 blazor WASM with chromium browsers, when using request streaming, `HttpRequestException` is thrown unexpectedly if a response is sent before the stream is fully sent to the server #104612
    9.0.0
  • Vector256 assert is firing for crossgen'd SPCL #90265
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'numArgs == 2' during 'Linear scan register alloc' with `Avx512F.VL.Fixup` and `Avx512F.VL.Shuffle2x128` #105970
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'childNode->canBeContained()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' with `Avx512F.FixupScalar` #105968
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'varDsc->GetRegNum() == REG_STK' during 'Generate code' with `Avx512F.Fixup` #105967
    9.0.0
  • Announcement: PR Merge on Green will be enforced from 3/19/2024 #99643
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 ReadyToRun regression bug: TypeLoadException #96225
    9.0.0
  • Test failures with COMPlus_JitStackChecks=1 #74280
    9.0.0
  • [External] zlib has suppressed warnings #76095
    9.0.0
  • AndroidStripILAfterAOT likely causing "InvalidProgramException: Invalid IL code in ..." #104156
    9.0.0
  • Follow up items for Options validation source generator #87844
    9.0.0
  • Crash when disposing an EventListener during shutdown #103480
    9.0.0
  • Deserializing DateTimeFormatInfo.AbbreviatedMonthNames from a JSON configuration file causes "ArgumentException: Length of the array must be 13" despite correct input #90022
    9.0.0
  • Regression: ZipFile/ZipArchive entry name decoding not working correctly when entryNameEncoding is specified #92283
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Potential bad codegen for `AVX512F.BlendVariable`/`AVX512F.BlendVariable` #105822
    9.0.0
  • Net8 - Vector2.Normalize and old(?) CPU - wrong result #99391
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator emits SYSLIB1100 when it shouldn't apply #93132
    9.0.0
  • Environment variable DOTNET_DbgEnableMiniDump=1 doens't work when unhandled exception occurs in worker thread #103000
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't warn on reflection access to annotated members when the source of the `Type` is GetType on a DAM-annotated class #102002
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_DeleteCategory #94395
    9.0.0
  • Using EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator and Uri property wrong binding when null #98943
    9.0.0
  • Configuration binding generator produces incorrect type #95561
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_stacks != nullptr' during 'SSA: insert phis' #105667
    9.0.0
  • SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue fails on distros without quic #82077
    8.0.0
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' during 'Generate code' #105723
    9.0.0
  • [IILink] UnsafeAccessor work for CorLib #106009
  • Arm64/Sve: Sve_Multiply tests failing #105736
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Evaluate methods with short arguments #93057
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix class returned on evaluation of expression with "?" #69543
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Show correct datatypes for int, long, double #93971
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Todo in expression evaluation #65864
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Support complex expressions with null-condition #69640
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-mathematical expression #76015
    Future
  • [wasm[debugger] Support `DebuggerTypeProxyAttribute(string)` #77315
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by `object` schema #77536
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Expand support of `DebuggerTypeProxy` #77768
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerRootHidden` elements cannot have identical names #77965
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Invoke static getter in valuetype not working #80049
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] RootHidden is not working correctly in DebuggerTypeProxy #76876
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix behavior about setting breakpoints on hidden lines #73867
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Detect when overriding field is overridden on `GetProperties` #73298
    Future
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exception reason on evaluation of method that throws #69300
    Future
  • System.IO.IOException: ' Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream.' #98654
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 16 Regressions on 12/12/2023 7:40:56 AM #96193
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Roslyn/CscBench/CscBench.cmd #98596
    9.0.0
  • How to post-processing binaries before bundling when use Publish AOT? #106003
  • [iOS] App crashes with native out of memory error due to memory leak of elements inside a Grid. #104272
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CancelTest / ReceiveAsync_Cancel_Success (server: ws://corefx-net.cloudapp.net/WebSocket/EchoWebSocket.ashx) #19217
    Future
  • Compiling .NET 8 into native AOT was detected as a trojan virus by antivirus software. #105959
  • Avoid building `StringBuilder` in `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler` #105775
  • Appending formatted `StringBuilder` into itself requires documenting on reference #105957
  • HttpClient(AndroidMessageHandler) with NTLM v2 auth and Self Signed Certificate returns 401 Unauthorized #102107
  • ConcurrentDictionary.TryGetValue crashes with System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException #102545
  • Null ThreadHandle in .NET 8 #103129
  • [API Proposal]: Add helper to be able to use options while registering services #105914
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [PERF] Remove --user from pip installs #106055
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix input size flag on `vpermd`. #106054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • TimeOnlyConverter should tolerate more formats in line with TimeSpanConverter #106053
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #106052
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring back assert in fx_ver_t::parse #106050
    area-Host
  • Backport https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/100528 to release/8.0 to fix Perf runs. #106049
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 Helix Images to pipeline #106048
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Use `jitstd::utility::scoped_code` to unmark trees during lowering #106046
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #106045
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #106044
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure get_total_soh_stable_size never return zero #106043
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [EventPipe] Block EventPipeProvider Deletion for ongoing callbacks #106040
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix compilation of NativeAOT with Xcode 16 #106039
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Added AsReadOnly() extension to ISet<T> #106037
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #106031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix long branches in jiterpreter #106030
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Mark AOT modules unusable if no AOT version is found #106026
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0] Bump additional npm deps and lock file format #106019
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] HijackFrame::UpdateRegDisplay update A0 #106018
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure owning type of GVMs is kept #106016
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • EventSource startup initialization #106014
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #106013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix typo in comment of SAVE_ARGUMENT_REGISTERS #106011
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Move RequiresAlign8 flag from RareFlags into ExtendedFlags #106010
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • fix infinite loop in foregroundgc test #106006
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add memory barriers to native AOT asm helpers #106004
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix TimeZone Names #106038
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Don't hit all properties on Color in ColorTranslator #106042
    area-System.Drawing
  • Fix _LOGALLOC define #106023
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [browser] http streaming request server error #105709
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update branding to 8.0.9 #106035
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.34 #106034
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Lower expected object count in gcheapenumerationprofiler test #106008
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure we aren't containing nodes that shouldn't be contained #105993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Add release/9.0 to the trigger includes for perf and perf_slow. #106032
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData getting COM RCW/CCW #105846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix problem in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints (Recovery PR) #105835
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Fix JitStackChecks failures #105711
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [EventPipe] Handle EventPipe Enable calls during shutdown #105842
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #105888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure embedded masking is handled for emitIns_R_R #105972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix dump generation on background threads #105898
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix SVE API formatting for FFR APIs #106017
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make ReflectionAccessAnalyzer logic more similar to ILLink/ILC #105956
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Extend USEASG liveness to cover partial writes to retbufs #105996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Merge `.managedcode` and `hydrated` sections into well-known sections #106012
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Generate FMA uses in the correct order #105723 #105885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Emit predicated version of the MUL instruction for Sve.Multiply() #105948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Enable ReceiveAsync_Cancel_Success test #105995
    area-System.Net
  • Delete some useless RareFlags #105945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix comments around static constructor memory #105911
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [debugger] Adding comment #105999
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Fix Reg Order for Float Registers #105930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #105117

  • SunOS process and thread support #105403

    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution

  • Consider methods returning constants same as substitutions #105878
